headline.main: MANCHUKUO BORDER IS DECLARED QUIET; Soviet Spokesman Says Last Incident Was on Oct. 23

lead_paragraph: KUIBYSHEV, Russia, Nov. 5-- At a press conference today the official spokesman, S.A. Lozovsky, said there had not been any incidents along the Manchukuo border since the frontier affray of Oct. 23.
snippet: KUIBYSHEV, Russia, Nov. 5-- At a press conference today the official spokesman, S.A. Lozovsky, said there had not been any incidents along the Manchukuo border since the frontier affray of Oct. 23....

byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
